    Hi, I‚Äôm Junting Wang.

    I‚Äôm a third year Ph.D. student at Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, working with Prof. Hari Sundaram. I received both my B.S. and M.S. in Computer Science from University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 2020 and 2022.

    I was also an Applied Scientist Intern at Entity Resolution (2022) and International Machine Learning (2024) team @Amazon.

    My broader research interests include recommender systems and graph neural networks, with a particular focus on the challenges of sparsity and trustworthiness of these models. Currently, I‚Äôm also exploring LLM-enhanced recommendation systems and causal representation learning.
